housinglib package

Submodules

housinglib.housinglib module

Module contents

housinglib.data_prep(housing_path, project_path)[source]

data_prep function prepares the training and testing set and dumps the imputer as pickle.

Parameters

  • housing_path – Path to save the datasets

  • project_path – Path to root directory of the project

Return type

None.

housinglib.desc_tree(housing_prepared, housing_labels)[source]

This function trains the data on the decision tree regressor.

Parameters

  • housing_prepared – prepared dataset for training.

  • housing_labels – Labels of the data frame.

Return type

RMSE, MAE.

housinglib.fetch_housing_data(housing_url, housing_path)[source]

This function fetches the data from the input url and downloads the file in the provided local path.

Parameters

  • housing_url – link to download the dataset

  • housing_path – Path to save the datasets

housinglib.income_cat_proportions(data)[source]
housinglib.lin_reg(housing_prepared, housing_labels)[source]

Trains the linear regression model

Parameters

  • housing_prepared – prepared dataset for training.

  • housing_labels – Labels of the data frame.

Return type

RMSE, MAE.

housinglib.load_data(housing_path)[source]

load_data function loads the data to the data/raw folder in the main folder structure.

Parameters

housing_path – Path to save the datasets

housinglib.load_housing_data(housing_path)[source]

This function loads the data from the in put path and returns the pandas dataframe.

Parameters

housing_path – Path to save the datasets

Return type

data_frame from the input file.

housinglib.load_test_data(project_path)[source]

This function load the test data and the imputer used while preparing train data.

Parameters

project_path – Path to root directory of the project

Return type

test_set, imputer

housinglib.load_train_data(project_path)[source]

load_train_data function loads the training data. It returns the X_train and y_train subsets.

Parameters

project_path – Path to root directory of the project

Return type

housing_prepared, housing_labels

housinglib.model_score(model, test_data, imputer)[source]

This function returns the score of the model.

Parameters

  • model – Best fit model on the training data

  • test_data – Test data to run the model on and generate scores

  • imputer – imputer used while preparing train data

Return type

final_mse, final_rmse

housinglib.random_forest(housing_prepared, housing_labels)[source]

This function trains the data on the random foreset regressor for different params.

Parameters

  • housing_prepared – prepared dataset for training.

  • housing_labels – Labels of the data frame.

Return type

final_model
